cover_letter.intro_para: I am interested in applying for a summer internship position at Skidmore, Owings and Merrill. After speaking with you over the phone this past summer, I became increasingly interested in pursuing a job with your company. I have a strong interest in both architecture and structural engineering and I think I would be a great fit with the SOM culture and bring the necessary abilities to go above and beyond my job requirements.

para_background.experience: Growing up I was exceedingly interested in the study of architecture. However it was not until late in highschool that I realized that my interests were more technical in nature. Now in my fourth year at Northeastern University I am pursuing a master's degree in civil engineering with a focus in structural. I have taken courses both the technical aspects of engineering and design as well as a class on the history of architecture in America.
I gained technical communication skills from my work as a TA at Knowledge University. I often had to explain technical info in many different ways.

I have previous experience with AutoCAD, Revit, and other design programs from my previous work at Simpson, Gumpertz and Heger. I became well versed in AudoCAD while creating and updating structural and building technology related drawings and with it.

closing_statements.compatability: I think I will fit in well with the holistic design culture of SOM.
closing_statements.next_step: I have attached my resume to this letter and I hope to hear from you in the future regarding possible opennings for interns in the Summer of 2017.
